sn37.24:1.1: “Pancahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn37.24:1.3: Panatipata pativirato ca hoti, adinnadana pativirato ca hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato ca hoti, musavada pativirato ca hoti, suramerayamajjappamadatthana pativirato ca hoti—
sn37.24:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati”ti.
